about_the_game:
Do you think you have a good aim? Prove it in AIMTROPOLIS, an arcade shooter for VR where you’ll have to beat a series of minigames in random order that will change in every game depending on the difficulty you choose. Get the highest score in all the minigames and rise until you reach number 1!

Precision and speed will be the key to getting a good score, so pay attention to the rules of each minigame! Every time you finish one, your score will get registered in the national and worldwide rankings, and you’ll be able to measure your skill up against people around the world! Will you be able to crown yourself?





In each game of AIMTROPOLIS you’ll have to beat 8 minigames set in 5 different worlds that will occur in random order, and will be determined by the difficulty level you choose. At launch, the game will have 20 minigames, and will receive free updates each month until November of 2023, when it’ll reach 50 minigames in total.

The 5 worlds inside the game are unique and in each of them you’ll find a totally different setting with its own unique soundtrack. Put yourself in the shoes of a sheriff in the wild West, face off against pirates in the Caribbean, or travel through time and visit the Middle Ages or a futuristic world of science fiction.

The number of minigames, worlds and difficulty levels will make it so that no game of AIMTROPOLIS is the same as the previous. Let the minigames begin!





  • 50 minigames; 20 at launch and 5 new ones every month from July to November of 2023.
  • 8 minigames per game.
  • 5 worlds with unique settings.
  • 4 difficulty levels to choose from.
  • National and worldwide rankings.
  • Soundtrack created and designed specifically for each world of the game.
  • Skins, achievements and bonus levels.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requiere mandos con sensor de movimiento. Compatibilidad con HTC Vive y Oculus Rift.
